zenCSS - The design brief

Default, light, brand specific, and dark Image/Text components

Components automatically inherit the color theme of their parent.

How to use

Setup a standard column and row, then insert these two z-col elements in your desired order.

 
<z-col>
  <img src="..." alt="">
</z-col>

<z-col>
  <div class="center-vertical">
    <h4>Lorem Ipsum Dolor</h4>
    <p> Eos tenetur corrupti, minima doloribus quam eveniet libero. </p>
  </div>
</z-col>

The Zen Test

Every part, section, and modifier we ship pass alignment, style, and functional tests to ensure they perform flawlessly in today's modern browsers.

So you can be assured it "just works". Try it out below.
